text: yes
how are you?
It is good
That's good. I'm doing good as well.
What do you think of this charity?
I think it is pretty good. What about you?
It think it is a terrible idea.
Why do you think that?
Charity such as this does not actually pull people out of poverty.
Well it does help somewhat. I don't think that anything will pull people completely out of poverty. It's a hand up.

It is good on a basic humanitarian level. The money could be far better spent in opening up their native countries to the global system of trade. The west has spent trillions in aid over the last 60 years in Africa and do not have anything to show for it.
That is true. The poor are barely left to survive while the rich get richer. It's a sad truth.

There is nothing morally wrong with the rich getting richer. In the last 10 years those rich people have invested in the global trade system and brought over a billion people out of the world poverty threshold. In the world there is an elite segment of the population that provides most of the value for society, they should be the ones with the lion share of the resources. This is because the only way they can obtain a large amount of wealth in the first place is to make hundreds, thousands, and millions of mutually beneficial transactions.
That's a valid point. What do you think can help?

Greater free trade between countries and the ability for poor people to have access to sources of micro finance and capital goods so that many of them can invest in tools that make themselves more productive and cap dig their way out of poverty.
That would be good for the world. There's no reason for us to not have free trade really. I think most people would give anything to get out of poverty if given a chance.
What are your thoughts on the donation amount?
I want to donate $0 I need money for myself.
Lol, there is no argument that your own personal economic activity would not do more good than this charity.
I'm broke as it is. That's why I'm here. lol
